channel.title: Problem with cfg files?
channel.description: There is a huge problem with my cfg files, let me start by saying I use Allstar Cleaned 1u1. How do I add npcdrops.cfg to the files. I add it manually by just making a new word doc, and saving it as .cfg but when I put in the npc id's and drops etc, the drops [b]do not appear.[/b] Please help me, thanks.
